name: Gravity Dungeon (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Your goal is simply to reach the end of the dungeon without being killed by enemies. Destroy the enemies with your gun.

Use WASD to move, shift to dash, and space to switch gravity. Use your mouse to aim your weapon and left click to shoot.

Three possible downloads: Windows, Mac and Linux builds. 

With experimental 2D lights, the Unity WebGL builds do not render anything but black screens.
